ModMetaData.name: Stony campfire Src
ModMetaData.author: Gouda quiche
ModMetaData.description:
Adds stony campfire to build. - Wont disappear when out of fuel. - Shows fire overlay accordingly. - Glows accordingly. - Heats accordingly. - Toggles gather spot accordingly.
Bugs : - The glow is there even when the fire is not lit, as long as it has fuel - Pawns should be able to cook even when fire is not lit, as long as it has fuel
